Frequently Asked Questions

What's included in the free trial?
All plans include a 14-day free trial with full access to platform features. No credit card required to start.
Can I upgrade or downgrade my plan?
Yes, you can change your subscription plan at any time. Upgrades take effect immediately, and downgrades apply at your next billing cycle.
Do you offer custom enterprise solutions?
Yes, we provide custom solutions for large organizations, professional teams, and multi-program institutions. Contact our sales team for details.
What sports are supported?
We support MLB, NFL, NBA, NCAA football & baseball, high school football, and Perfect Game youth baseball. International prospects from Latin America, Japan, South Korea, and KBO are also included.
Is there an additional cost for video analysis?
Video intelligence upload and analysis are included in Professional and Championship plans. Scout plan users can upgrade to add this feature.
What kind of support do you provide?
All plans include comprehensive support. Scout gets email support, Professional gets priority support, and Championship includes a dedicated account manager.
